headline: Air Products Director Lisa Davis Elects to Not Stand for Re-election at the Company's January 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders
summary: Air Products (NYSE:APD) today announced that Lisa A. Davis has decided to not stand for re-election at the Company's 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders on January 28, 2026 and to retire from the board following the conclusion of the Annual Meeting.

raw.headline: Air Products Director Lisa Davis Elects to Not Stand for Re-election at the Company's January 2026 Annual Meeting of Shareholders

headline: Air Products Leadership to Speak at Citi's Basic Materials Conference
summary: Air Products' (NYSE:APD) Chief Executive Officer Eduardo Menezes and Chief Financial Officer Melissa Schaeffer will participate in a fireside chat at Citi's Basic Materials Conference on Tuesday, December 2, 2025 at 8:40 a.m. USET.
